DataElement.preferredName: Marijuana Personal Medical History Use Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indicator related to the history of marijuana (cannabis, weed, hash) use.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any part of, or extract from, the female hemp plant Cannabis sativa.  Marijuana contains cannabinoids, substances with hallucinogenic, psychoactive, and addictive properties.  This agent has potential use for treating cancer pain and cachexia. (NCI04)_A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies._To put into action or service.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.:Any part of, or extract from, the female hemp plant Cannabis sativa.  Marijuana contains cannabinoids, substances with hallucinogenic, psychoactive, and addictive properties.  This agent has potential use for treating cancer pain and cachexia. (NCI04)

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Any part of, or extract from, the female hemp plant Cannabis sativa.  Marijuana contains cannabinoids, substances with hallucinogenic, psychoactive, and addictive properties.  This agent has potential use for treating cancer pain and cachexia. (NCI04)

Property.preferredDefinition: To put into action or service.

Concepts.definition: To put into action or service.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016
